desc: Ascetia's flagship product, Antiflame-X, is a natural, lab-tested nutraceutical spray that combines time-tested natural components with pharmaceutical grade manufacturing processes for clinically proven results. Just spray under your tongue twice a day to give your immune system the reboot it needs.

layout.text: At last - a natural, lab-tested, clinically proven nutraceutical spray that really makes a difference. Stop being disappointed & start taking Ascetia.
